name: All Flame
description:
All Flame

Guiding souls to the afterlife is a thankless job, but alas someone must do it...

This game was created in 3 days for Mini Jam - 50

Controls:

  • Keyboard - WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Space to interact
  • Controller - Left Joystick to move, Button 0 to interact (X or A on most gamepads)
